mapper.select: select a.* from ( select b.*, rownum rn from ( select reg_no , member_id , bank , account_no , account_own , reg_recash , to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') as reg_date , nvl(to_char(recash_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'N') as recash_date from recash where reg_date=#{reg_date}] order by 1 desc ) b ) a where rn between #{first} and #{last}
mapper.update: update recash set recash_date=sysdate where recash_date is null and reg_date is not null
